Home.description: Mobile Developer, passionate about technology, always looking for challenges and project to have constant learning. Currently focused on mobile development which is an area with a lot of news and knowledge that I intend to learn.
Home.aboutMeDescription: I'm Rafael Santana, Mobile Developer and graduated in Systems Analysis and Development. Focused on mobile development, I always try to write well-designed, testable, efficient code using current best practices in web development and learn new technologies. Currently, I'm studying some technologies like React, React Native, Magento, Firebase, Node, Express, Materialize, Sequelize, among others.
